thread.title: Khalid laughs off suit by Tajuddin
thread.title_full: Khalid laughs off suit by Tajuddin

title: Khalid laughs off suit by Tajuddin
text:
More 
Shah Alam MP Khalid Samad has laughed off a lawsuit filed against him by Agriculture and Agro-based Industries Deputy Minister Tajuddin Abdul Rahman. 
Among the points which he found "amusing" in the defamation suit, were the claims that his remarks implied the Umno deputy minister was a person who, among others, is not a good Muslim, condemned to hell, morally decrepit and unfit to be an MP and deputy minister.
